basics.name: Hassan Oyeboade
basics.label: Experienced Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an innovative and experienced software engineer with over six years experience in building robust solutions and improving software performance. I have lots of experience translating user requirements into practical solutions. I possess in-depth knowledge of different software architectures with the ability to apply them to new and existing software systems

work.summary:
Developed an online Education management system application for secondary and tertiary schools
Developed a pediatric health literacy project using OpenAI API

Developed new integrations to expand product inventories, increasing the number of user results and the company's revenue using Python, Django Rest Framework, Redis and Celery
Implemented retry mechanism for failed leads and opportunities generation, leading to a simplified ops process and accurate data using Python, Django Rest Framework, ExpressJS and BullMQ

Led the expansion of channels for collecting customer orders, leading to increased sales using NodeJS, React, Flutter, AWS Lambda and Whatsapp API
Designed and developed new payment integrations and maintained existing ones facilitating a smooth process for payment managers to make payments using NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB.
Developed slack bot for engineers to submit requests to DevOps, leading to improved resolution time, and providing analysis for the DevOps team using Python, Web.py, MongoDB and Slack API

Developed a project health dashboard providing reports on active projects leading to better project insights and increased project velocity using ReactJS, Python, Flask, MySQL, Slack API and Jira API.
Set up GitHub workflows to automatically build docker images for the GCP registry, removing the need for manual deployments by developers and reducing deployment time.
Achieved a significant reduction in API response time on various systems by leveraging caching and asynchronous operations using Python, Flask, Redis and Celery.

Developed tested API endpoints using Python, Django and Django Rest Framework to support web and mobile users while working in a small team
Achieved an increase in app monetization by collaborating with team members to design and implement features that impact app monetization

Developed API endpoints to support business requirements for Andela partners using Python, Django, Flask and Postgres
Collaborated with team members to design and implement features for internal tools using NodeJS, GraphQ and  ReactJS
Conducted interviews for prospective Engineers to determine technical and cultural fit

Modified the data storage service on the back end to use AWS Aurora instead of DynamoDB which ensured super cost-effective throughputs
Designed responsive UI pages using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Angular
Used Git and Gitlab for version control and collaboration

Implemented REST API endpoints using Python/Django/Django Rest Framework and added features to the app SOAP/XML wrapper using NodeJS
Set up async processes using celery, mail subscription systems, promotion features, and updated AWS Elastic Beanstalk deployment
Worked with other developers on payment system implementation using Stripe endpoints
Integrated test coverage measurement with Codecov
